```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
avocado <- avocado %>% 
  filter(region=="Albany") 

ggplot(avocado,aes(type, AveragePrice, fill=type))+
  geom_boxplot()
```
